DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study ass overall Sjogren 's Syndrome subject 's preference particular product . Dry eye symptom relief also evaluate base clinical evaluation set subject questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Patients must least 18 year age , must read sign informed consent form ( ICF ) , must agree comply study requirement . Patients must best correct visual acuity 0.6 LogMar good eye , must report ocular examination last two year must use topical ocular dry eye therapy ( artificial tear Restasis ) least 4 time per day . Patients must diagnose Sjogren 's Syndrome ( confirm consistent AmericanEuropean Consensus Criteria 2002 ) . Patients wear contact lens within one week prior visit 1 wear contact lenses study . Patients history hypersensitivity component FID 114657 , diabetes ( Type 1 2 ) . Patients ocular intraocular surgery serious ocular trauma within past 6 month , eyelid abnormality might affect lid function . Patients punctal plug place less equal 30 day prior Visit 1 , active infection inflammation associate Sjogren 's Syndrome . They start change dose chronic systemic medication within 7 day prior visit 1 , must remain stable dose regimen duration study . Patients participate another investigational clinical research study within 30 day visit 1 allowed participate drug device clinical trial duration study . Patients finding vitreous , retina , macula choroid show sign active inflammation and/or structural change opinion investigator consider abnormal unstable participant and/or score great 0 optic nerve . Patients punctal cauterization within 30 day prior Visit 1 , history undergoing prior cataract surgery complication result cataract surgery . Participants undergone prior cataract surgery without complication must least six month postop stable refractive error . Patients receive ocular prescription therapy last 30 day ( Restasis use long stable least 30 day ) .
